trans-unit.source: Enables access to ASP intrinsic values from <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ContextUtil.GetNamedProperty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The ASP intrinsic objects can be obtained within a COM+ object using the named properties available from the COM+ object context when the object was created from ASP.
With ASP.NET, a new set of intrinsic objects is used, which are not accessed from a context but rather methods in a namespace, much like the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ContextUtil> class.

The case of COM+ objects created from ASP.NET is viable; therefore the intrinsic objects available to COM objects from the COM+ object context might be required so that the COM+ object can interact with ASP.NET.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IISIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, enabling access to the ASP intrinsic values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IISIntrinsicsAttribute"></xref> class, optionally disabling access to the ASP intrinsic values.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable access to the ASP intrinsic values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether access to the ASP intrinsic values is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
